SELECT T1.MATER_NO, NVL(T1.MATER_NAME,T1.MATER_NO) MATER_NAME, SUM(NVL(T1.PRODUCT_QTY,1)) BIN_COUNT FROM WBS_BIN T JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T1.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID JOIN PSB_BIN_STATUS T2 ON T2.BIN_NO = T.BIN_NO WHERE T2.USED_FLAG = 1 AND T2.BIN_STATUS = CHR(36) AND T2.BIN_BIZ_STATUS = '_'
T1.MATER_NO like '%'||#where.MATER_NO#||'%'
T1.MATER_NAME like '%'||#where.MATER_NAME#||'%'
GROUP BY T1.MATER_NO, T1.MATER_NAME ORDER BY T1.MATER_NO
